channel.title: Read please.... Wondering how other people can join to my server with a client
channel.description:
Ok so i have a server and a client i port forwarded and all but i dont know how to give people my client like a download so if anyone could help that would be awesome !! :D
Thanks

item.title: Read please.... Wondering how other people can join to my server with a client
item.dc:creator: @Anc13ntsIsBack Anc13ntsIsBack
item.description:
@Anc13ntsIsBack wrote:

lol ok this is what i meant i tried to search for the default IP in the client.java folder but cant find it ...... im using [b]austin cadle's [562/659] Project DungeonFest Release! [PDF] Version 1! [/b] source. If you can help or try to help please pm me or reply :)

thanks for all of the help though so far !

30l2ptv.png1002×218

item.title: Read please.... Wondering how other people can join to my server with a client
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

First edit your client to have your ip address(www.whatsmyip.com) and then compress it and upload.

Some sites to upload your client on:
www.uppit.com

MediaFire

MediaFire

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.


www.rapidshare.com
www.megaupload.com

Read full topic
item.source: Read please.... Wondering how other people can join to my server with a client

item.title: Read please.... Wondering how other people can join to my server with a client
item.dc:creator: @macca4g macca4g
item.description:
@macca4g wrote:

This is easy you zip your client and post it on a uploading site, then you just tell them to click the run.bat and then your client will load.

Make sure you have coded the no-ip into the client so when people download they can connect =-)

Read full topic
